tictactoe.description: Tic-Tac-Toe game with 4x4/3x3 grid. You can play on local or bot. Customizable theme. BG music. Plenty of modes and features.

blog.description: Simple blog site with imported posts from data object. Dark/light mode, and interactive posts, implemented as a single-page application (SPA).

wearethechampion.description: This project showcases a simple web application that allows users to write and publish endorsements. Website with interactive user interface.

restaurant.description: simple restaurant order system that allows users to view a menu, add items to their order, and complete the payment process.

tenzies.description: Roll until all dice are the same. Click each die to freeze it at its current value between rolls.

portfolio.description: Portfolio website to showcase projects and to tell about myself :)
